mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, PUNISH_TYPE, RELEASE_TYPE, STATUS, REASON, SUPPLIER_NAME, TERM
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_BLACKLIST (ID, SUPPLIER_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, PUNISH_TYPE, RELEASE_TYPE, STATUS, REASON, SUPPLIER_NAME, TERM) values (#{id}, #{supplierId}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{punishType}, #{releaseType}, #{status}, #{reason}, #{supplierName}. #{term})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_BLACKLIST
ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
PUNISH_TYPE,
RELEASE_TYPE,
STATUS,
REASON,
SUPPLIER_NAME,
TERM,
#{id},
#{supplierId},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{punishType},
#{releaseType},
#{status},
#{reason},
#{supplierName},
#{term},
select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_BLACKLIST
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PUNISH_TYPE = #{punishType},
RELEASE_TYPE = #{releaseType},
STATUS = #{status},
REASON = #{reason},
SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName},
TERM = #{term},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select SUPPLIER_ID from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_BLACKLIST
and STATUS != #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_BLACKLIST set STATUS = #{status} where ID = #{id}
